attributes.action: Allow Christians to Wear Crosses At Work
attributes.additional_details:
The Sikh is allowed to wear his turban, the Muslims are allowed to wear their headscarf and the men wear their beards and caps.

Christians should be allowed to wear the Crucifix. This is a Christian country and how else can we show that? We should not be intimidated or forced to forfeit what we believe in as a people and as a country.
